hero.heading: Noise Cancelling
hero.copy: When it comes to creating a quiet home atmosphere, it’s what’s on the inside (of your doors) that counts.
hero.direction: Terms to keep in mind while you shop

inspiration.heading: Hollow Core
copy: Spoiler alert: hollow core doors aren’t hollow inside. They’re actually filled with a corrugated honeycomb recycled material. This filler makes them lightweight, light on your wallet...but light on noise cancelling.

inspiration.heading: Solid Core
copy: Solid core doors feel heavy in your hand, like solid wood. They’re filled with a low-density eco-friendly material that reduces sound transmission by 50 percent.

next.heading: Now, let’s go over your environmentally friendly options.
next.copy: Make sure your interior doors have a positive impact on the environment, both inside and outside your home.
